Lookup cache auto-refreshes on uploads with manual refresh button
Added Favorites and slideshow feature (includes video marquees)
Added copy button to log
/list handler for third party integration
Fixed intermittent 'not connected' boot screen
Changed video icon indicator
Ability to delete user-added system/console names

Added bulk upload support from Custom Upload in Companion, takes around 10 minutes to process 2000+ marquees and shows a progress update

Browse marquees in Pixelcade Companion is much faster now

User added systems in Companion will show up in a different color and sorted at
